title: Minecraft是吃CPU还是吃显卡呢
author: VanL1angXw
txt_content: 每次玩的时候帧数都好低呀

replies.author: 孤独的先生
replies.txt_content:
CPU与内存。

显卡绝对 你是否开了光影等什么东西

replies.author: 凛
replies.txt_content: 应该是CPU

replies.author: undefined
replies.txt_content:
mc吃cpu

显卡根本不怎么吃

replies.author: Because.
replies.txt_content:
吃CPU

--------“你的眼睛是为了相互认可而存在”
            “你的呼唤是为了传达思念而存在”
            “你的双手是为了握紧挚爱之人而存在”

replies.author: 八意史蒂夫
replies.txt_content: 吃CPU单核，内存。MC游戏端多线程优化不良。

replies.author: 邱景涛
replies.txt_content: 都吃，而且还吃内存

replies.author: L99
replies.txt_content: 通吃

replies.author: hhttll
replies.txt_content:
作为一个使用核显+16G内存+i7的苦逼表示

当然是吃显卡！！！！

replies.author: Ice_tuzi
replies.txt_content: 不开光影的话吃CPU和内存

replies.author: qyhaotime
replies.txt_content: 是你电脑配置低吧233

replies.author: 请无视此ID
replies.txt_content: 都吃，比较吃CPU，显卡有一点，内存吃的很厉害

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content: 他吃电脑  2333

replies.author: Z_Dreams_
replies.txt_content: 全部都吃（胃口真大）

replies.author: Justwithme
replies.txt_content: 应该是吃cpu~~~~

replies.author: 天空之城TMD
replies.txt_content:
基本上看CPU和人品（个人觉得还和系统有关系）
显卡的话不开光影影响不大

replies.author: 莉莉霍瓦特
replies.txt_content:
cpu是计算它加载区块的
显卡是画面质量的
内存更重要

replies.author: jerry730225
replies.txt_content: 感觉很吃内存的说……

replies.author: grania
replies.txt_content: 都吃的好伐

replies.author: 脑白鑫
replies.txt_content: MOD越多。就越吃内存和显卡。

replies.author: wddm
replies.txt_content: 纯净就不怎么吃的了。
绝对是CPU......
